modName: Gandalf-esque White Wizard Robes and Staff
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE - You WILL need to have completed the mage college quests in before installing the staff otherwise it will not be completable other than through console codes
 This is not meant to be an exact replica of gandalf the whites attire and staff, it is just giving you something better than what is available currently to look closer to him.

Required Mods :
Playable Graybeard Robes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1047

Reccomended Mods: 
Glamdring: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6687
 
White re-texture of greybeard robes to look slightly more like Gandalfs and a retexture and modded version of the Staff of Magnus renamed to Staff of Numenor which now does chainlightning for extra damage. 

Install:

Extract all files to - C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\
author: Cuzimazz
